description: Golden test set for regression testing

documents.title: Machine Learning Basics
documents.text: Machine learning is a subset of artificial intelligence. It enables systems to learn from data without explicit programming. Supervised learning uses labeled data, while unsupervised learning finds patterns in unlabeled data.

documents.title: Python Programming
documents.text: Python is a high-level programming language known for its simplicity. It supports multiple programming paradigms including object-oriented and functional programming. Python has a large standard library.

documents.title: Web Development
documents.text: Web development involves creating websites and web applications. Frontend development uses HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Backend development handles server-side logic and databases.

documents.title: Data Structures
documents.text: Data structures organize data in computer memory. Common structures include arrays, linked lists, stacks, queues, and trees. Efficient data structures improve algorithm performance.

documents.title: Cloud Computing
documents.text: Cloud computing delivers computing services over the internet. It provides on-demand access to computing resources. Major providers include AWS, Azure, and Google Cloud Platform.
